title: Example: Set <html lang> correctly
body:
Set the correct `lang` attribute on the root HTML element to improve accessibility and SEO.

Acceptance criteria:
- `<html lang="en">` (or appropriate locale) present
- Passes basic a11y checks

Notes: Update all HTML entry points if multiple exist.

title: Example: Add <meta charset> early in <head>
body: Ensure `<meta charset="utf-8">` is the first metadata in <head> to avoid encoding issues.
